snippet: Six people from a group known as the Church of the Almighty God were arrested in the killing of a woman at a McDonald’s restaurant in eastern china, but a cellphone video of the attack raised questions about whether witnesses should have...
abstract: Six people from a group known as the Church of the Almighty God were arrested in the killing of a woman at a McDonald’s restaurant in eastern china, but a cellphone video of the attack raised questions about whether witnesses should have intervened.

headline.main: Anger in China After McDonald's Patron Beaten to Death
